connection_details_dev.table_joins: select cc.table_name, cc.column_name, cc.reference_table_name, cc.reference_column_name from v_catalog.constraint_columns cc  inner join v_catalog.table_constraints tc on cc.constraint_id = tc.constraint_id inner join (select distinct Database_Table_Nm from $$rule_schema_name$$.Override_object_Map where Database_Table_Nm is not null and Override_Group = '$$Override_Group$$' ) fm on cc.table_name = fm.Database_Table_Nm where cc.reference_table_name is not null union select otj.table_name, otj.column_name, otj.reference_table_name, otj.reference_column_name from $$rule_schema_name$$.Override_Table_Join otj where otj.Override_Group = '$$Override_Group$$' order by 1,3;
connection_details_dev.table_joins_distinct: select distinct cc.table_name,   cc.reference_table_name,  join_type.fk_cols, join_type.pk_cols, case  when join_type.fk_cols = join_type.pk_cols then '1->1' else '*->1'  end j_cardinality from v_catalog.constraint_columns cc inner join v_catalog.table_constraints tc on  cc.constraint_id = tc.constraint_id inner join (  select   distinct Database_Table_Nm  from  $$rule_schema_name$$.Override_object_Map  where  Database_Table_Nm is not null and Override_Group = '$$Override_Group$$') fm on cc.table_name = fm.Database_Table_Nm left join ( select fk.reference_table_name, fk.table_name, count(fk.table_name) fk_cols, count(pk.column_name) pk_cols from ( select cc.table_name, column_name, reference_table_name, reference_column_name from  v_catalog.constraint_columns cc where constraint_type = 'f'  and table_schema in ('$$transaction_schema_name$$') ) fk  left join ( select  cc.table_name, cc.column_name from  v_catalog.constraint_columns cc where   constraint_type = 'p'  and table_schema in ('$$transaction_schema_name$$') ) pk on fk.table_name = pk.table_name and fk.column_name = pk.column_name  group by  fk.reference_table_name, fk.table_name) join_type on cc.reference_table_name = join_type.reference_table_name and cc.table_name = join_type.table_name where cc.reference_table_name is not null and cc.constraint_type = 'f' and table_schema in ('$$transaction_schema_name$$') order by cc.Table_Name, cc.reference_table_name;

invst.List_UI_Query: select o.Override_SID, o.Override_Group,o.Override_Nm Derivation_Name,o.Run_Seq_No,isnull(o.Completion_Status, 'NA')  Completion_Status,isnull(o.Created_By, 'NA') Created_By,isnull(o.Modified_By, 'NA') Modified_By,isnull(o.Modified_Date::varchar, 'NA') Modified_Date,o.Group_ID, o.Sub_Group_ID,o.DT_Rule_Id, o.JIRA_Ticket_ID, '0' TotalNoRules, '0' YTS, '0' In_Progress, '0' Completed,isnull(o.Data_Source_1_Nm,'NA') Agency,isnull(o.Comments,'NA') Description,isnull(o.Override_Release_Dt::varchar,'NA') ReleaseDate,isnull(o.Override_Due_Dt::varchar,'NA') DueDate,isnull(o.Owner,'NA') Owner,isnull(o.Effective_Dt::varchar,'NA') SurveyYear,isnull(o.Override_Version_Num,'NA') Version_Num,isnull(o.Assigned_To,'NA') Assigned_To, isnull(om.User_Defined_Table_Nm, 'NA') User_Defined_Table_Nm, isnull(om.User_Defined_Object_Nm, 'NA') User_Defined_Object_Nm, o.Constructed_SQL, o.Logical_SQL, isnull(o.Override_Type, 'NA') Override_Type, isnull(o.Modified_By, 'NA') Modified_By, isnull(o.Created_By, 'NA') Created_By, isnull(o.Created_Date::varchar, 'NA') Created_Date, isnull(o.Reuse_Override, 'NA') Library, isnull(o.Reuse_Scope, 'NA') Reuse_Scope, o.Target_Table_Nm, OT_Recent.Transaction_Dt, OT_Recent.Transaction_Cnt Row_Count, OT_Recent.Executed_By, CASE WHEN OT_Recent.Constructed_SQL_Run_Status ILIKE '%Success!' THEN 'Success' ELSE 'Failed' END Status from $$Schema_Name$$.$$Table_Name$$ o left join ( select ot.*,row_number() over (partition by ot.Override_SID order by ot.Transaction_Dt desc) as Transaction_Num from $$Schema_Name$$.$$Transaction_History_Table$$ ot ) OT_Recent on o.Override_SID = OT_Recent.Override_SID and OT_Recent.Transaction_Num = 1 left join $$Schema_Name$$.$$Field_Map_Table$$ om on om.Database_Table_Nm = o.Database_Table_Nm and om.Database_Object_Nm = o.Database_Object_Nm and o.Override_Group = om.Override_Group and o.Target_Schema_Nm = om.Source_Schema_Nm where o.Override_Group in ('$$CoreGroup$$');

viper.List_UI_Query: select o.Override_SID, o.Override_Group,o.Override_Nm Derivation_Name,o.Run_Seq_No,isnull(o.Completion_Status, 'NA')  Completion_Status,isnull(o.Created_By, 'NA') Created_By,isnull(o.Modified_By, 'NA') Modified_By,isnull(o.Modified_Date::varchar, 'NA') Modified_Date,o.Group_ID, o.Sub_Group_ID,o.DT_Rule_Id, o.JIRA_Ticket_ID, '0' TotalNoRules, '0' YTS, '0' In_Progress, '0' Completed,isnull(o.Data_Source_1_Nm,'NA') Agency,isnull(o.Comments,'NA') Description,isnull(o.Override_Release_Dt::varchar,'NA') ReleaseDate,isnull(o.Override_Due_Dt::varchar,'NA') DueDate,isnull(o.Owner,'NA') Owner,isnull(o.Effective_Dt::varchar,'NA') SurveyYear,isnull(o.Override_Version_Num,'NA') Version_Num,isnull(o.Assigned_To,'NA') Assigned_To, isnull(om.User_Defined_Table_Nm, 'NA') User_Defined_Table_Nm, isnull(om.User_Defined_Object_Nm, 'NA') User_Defined_Object_Nm, o.Constructed_SQL, o.Logical_SQL, isnull(o.Override_Type, 'NA') Override_Type, isnull(o.Modified_By, 'NA') Modified_By, isnull(o.Created_By, 'NA') Created_By, isnull(o.Created_Date::varchar, 'NA') Created_Date, isnull(o.Reuse_Override, 'NA') Library, isnull(o.Reuse_Scope, 'NA') Reuse_Scope, o.Target_Table_Nm, OT_Recent.Transaction_Dt, OT_Recent.Transaction_Cnt Row_Count, OT_Recent.Executed_By, CASE WHEN OT_Recent.Constructed_SQL_Run_Status ILIKE '%Success!' THEN 'Success' ELSE 'Failed' END Status from $$Schema_Name$$.$$Table_Name$$ o left join ( select ot.*,row_number() over (partition by ot.Override_SID order by ot.Transaction_Dt desc) as Transaction_Num from $$Schema_Name$$.$$Transaction_History_Table$$ ot ) OT_Recent on o.Override_SID = OT_Recent.Override_SID and OT_Recent.Transaction_Num = 1 left join $$Schema_Name$$.$$Field_Map_Table$$ om on om.Database_Table_Nm = o.Database_Table_Nm and om.Database_Object_Nm = o.Database_Object_Nm and o.Override_Group = om.Override_Group and o.Target_Schema_Nm = om.Source_Schema_Nm where o.Override_Group in ('$$CoreGroup$$');

rating.List_UI_Query: select o.Override_SID Override_SID, o.Override_Group,o.Override_Nm Derivation_Name,o.Target_Table_Nm Target_Table_UI,o.Target_Connection_ID Target_Connection_ID,o.Target_Schema_Nm Target_Schema_Nm, o.Run_Seq_No,isnull(o.Completion_Status, 'NA')  Completion_Status,isnull(o.Created_By, 'NA') Created_By,isnull(o.Modified_By, 'NA') Modified_By,isnull(o.Modified_Date::varchar, 'NA') Modified_Date,o.Group_ID, o.Sub_Group_ID,o.DT_Rule_Id, o.JIRA_Ticket_ID, '0' TotalNoRules, '0' YTS, '0' In_Progress, '0' Completed,isnull(o.Data_Source_1_Nm,'NA') Agency,isnull(o.Approval_Status,'NA') Approval_Status,isnull(o.Comments,'NA') Description,isnull(o.Override_Release_Dt::varchar,'NA') ReleaseDate,isnull(o.Override_Due_Dt::varchar,'NA') DueDate,isnull(o.Owner,'NA') Owner,isnull(o.Effective_Dt::varchar,'NA') SurveyYear,isnull(o.Override_Version_Num,'NA') Version_Num,isnull(o.Assigned_To,'NA') Assigned_To, isnull(om.User_Defined_Table_Nm, 'NA') User_Defined_Table_Nm, isnull(om.User_Defined_Object_Nm, 'NA') User_Defined_Object_Nm, o.Constructed_SQL, o.Logical_SQL, isnull(o.Override_Type, 'NA') Override_Type, isnull(o.Modified_By, 'NA') Modified_By, isnull(o.Created_By, 'NA') Created_By, isnull(o.Created_Date::varchar, 'NA') Created_Date, isnull(o.Reuse_Override, 'NA') Library, isnull(o.Reuse_Scope, 'NA') Reuse_Scope, o.Target_Table_Nm, OT_Recent.Transaction_Dt, isnull(OT_Recent.Transaction_Cnt::varchar,'0')  Row_Count, OT_Recent.Executed_By, CASE WHEN OT_Recent.Constructed_SQL_Run_Status ILIKE '%Success!' THEN 'Success' ELSE 'Failed' END Status from $$Schema_Name$$.$$Table_Name$$ o left join ( select ot.*,row_number() over (partition by ot.Override_SID order by ot.Transaction_Dt desc) as Transaction_Num from $$Schema_Name$$.$$Transaction_History_Table$$ ot ) OT_Recent on o.Override_SID = OT_Recent.Override_SID and OT_Recent.Transaction_Num = 1 left join $$Schema_Name$$.$$Field_Map_Table$$ om on om.Database_Table_Nm = o.Database_Table_Nm and om.Database_Object_Nm = o.Database_Object_Nm and o.Override_Group = om.Override_Group and o.Target_Schema_Nm = om.Source_Schema_Nm where o.Override_Group in ('$$CoreGroup$$');

override_tables.override_join_table_comment: // 010323 -- This table (Override_Join) stores the CUSTOM JOINS for a given rule. Make entries in this table if the system generated joins does not meet your needs.

querys.select_rules: select * from $$Schema_Name$$.$$Table_Name$$ order by Sub_Condition_No asc
querys.get_column_datatype: SELECT data_type_id FROM v_catalog.columns where table_schema = '$$Schema_Name$$' and table_name = '$$Table_Name$$' and column_name = '$$Column_Name$$';
querys.querytogetdatatype: SELECT  table_name,column_name,data_type,data_type_id FROM v_catalog.columns WHERE table_schema = '$$Schema_Name$$' AND table_name IN ($$Table_Name$$);
querys.lastexecuted_derivationhistory: SELECT $$Column_Names$$ FROM $$Schema_Name$$.$$Table_Name$$ where Override_SID IN ($$Derivation_ID$$) GROUP by Override_SID;
querys.sequence_generator_query: SELECT sequence_name,identity_table_name  FROM sequences WHERE sequence_schema = '$$Schema_Name$$'
querys.select_field_map_query: SELECT * from $$Schema_Name$$.$$Table_Name$$ WHERE Override_Group='$$ds_group_name$$' order by 1
querys.MoveUpDown_Update_Sequence_QuerryMT: UPDATE $$Schema_Name$$.$$Table_Name$$ SET $$Seq_Column$$ = CASE $$Derivation_ID_Column$$ WHEN $$From_Derivation_ID$$ THEN $$To_Seq_No$$ WHEN $$To_Derivation_ID$$ THEN $$From_Seq_No$$ END WHERE $$Derivation_ID_Column$$ IN ($$From_Derivation_ID$$, $$To_Derivation_ID$$)
querys.sequence_generatorquery_vertica: SELECT sequence_name,identity_table_name,sequence_schema  FROM sequences where sequence_schema in ($$transaction_schema$$);
querys.sequence_generatorquery_oracle: select sequence_owner AS sequence_schema, sequence_name from all_sequences WHERE sequence_owner IN ($$transaction_schema$$)
querys.select_override_group_adv: select o.Override_SID, o.Override_Nm, isnull(om.User_Defined_Table_Nm, 'NA') User_Defined_Table_Nm, isnull(om.User_Defined_Object_Nm, 'NA') User_Defined_Object_Nm, o.Constructed_SQL, o.Logical_SQL, isnull(o.Override_Type, 'NA') Override_Type, isnull(o.Modified_By, 'NA') Modified_By, isnull(o.Created_By, 'NA') Created_By, isnull(o.Created_Date::varchar, 'NA') Created_Date, isnull(o.Reuse_Override, 'NA') Reuse_Override, isnull(o.Reuse_Scope, 'NA') Reuse_Scope, o.Target_Table_Nm, OT_Recent.Transaction_Dt, OT_Recent.Transaction_Cnt, OT_Recent.Executed_By, OT_Recent.Constructed_SQL_Run_Status from $$Schema_Name$$.$$Table_Name$$ o left join ( select ot.*, row_number() over (partition by ot.Override_SID order by ot.Transaction_Dt desc) as Transaction_Num from $$Schema_Name$$.$$Transaction_History_Table$$ ot ) OT_Recent on o.Override_SID = OT_Recent.Override_SID and OT_Recent.Transaction_Num = 1 left join $$Schema_Name$$.$$Field_Map_Table$$ om on om.Database_Table_Nm = o.Database_Table_Nm and om.Database_Object_Nm = o.Database_Object_Nm and o.Override_Group = om.Override_Group and o.Target_Schema_Nm = om.Source_Schema_Nm where o.Override_Group in ($$GroupNm$$) and o.Override_Type in ('Group', 'Single Rule-I', 'Single Rule-U')
querys.select_override_group_adv_comment: This Advanced SQL joins with all related tables (Override, Override_Group, Override_Object_Map, Transaction_History_Table) and prepares the data, eliminates several steps of multiple SQL statments, multiple collections and the related C# processing. This improves performance
querys.select_override_groups_comment: // 123022 -- Retrieves a list of Override Groups. Used in Copy to another Group feature...
querys.select_override_join_comment: // 010323 Select the CUSTOM JOINS from Override_Join Table. This table stores the CUSTOM JOINS for a given rule. Make entrie in this table if system generated joins does not meet your needs.
querys.select_override_join: SELECT SCD_Override_Join_SID, Override_Join_SID, Override_SID, Condition_No, Sub_Condition_No, Join_Type, Join_Table, Join_Table_Col_LH, Equality_Operator, Join_Table_Col_RH, Join_Operator, Sort_Order, Comments, Valid_From_Dt, Valid_To_Dt, Latest_Ind FROM $$Schema_Name$$.$$Table_Name$$ Order By Override_SID, Sort_Order;

connection_template.all_table_columns_sql: select TABLE_NAME,COLUMN_NAME,DATA_TYPE from all_tab_columns WHERE OWNER in ($$transaction_schema_name$$) order by table_name

connection_template.field_map_sql: SELECT column_id Override_Object_Map_SID, column_name User_Defined_Object_Nm, column_name Database_Object_Nm, 'Field' Object_Type, table_name User_Defined_Table_Nm, table_name Database_Table_Nm FROM v_catalog.columns c where table_schema = '$$Schema_Name$$' and table_name not in (select distinct Database_Table_Nm from $$Schema_Name$$.Override_object_Map) union select to_char(Override_Object_Map_SID) Override_Object_Map_SID, User_Defined_Object_Nm, Database_Object_Nm, Object_Type, User_Defined_Table_Nm, Database_Table_Nm from $$Schema_Name$$.Override_object_Map
connection_template.all_table_columns_sql: SELECT TABLE_NAME,COLUMN_NAME,DATA_TYPE FROM v_catalog.columns WHERE table_schema in ($$transaction_schema_name$$) order by column_name

ALTERNATIVE_SECTION_HEADER.Effective_Date EQUALS 2020-09-30: select 'Running 13 Month Reconciliations - AS OF: ' || CURRENT_DATE
ALTERNATIVE_SECTION_HEADER.Effective_Date EQUALS 2020-07-30: select 'Rolling 13 month metrics - EFFECTIVE DATE Range from '||(ADD_MONTHS(trunc(INPUT_FILE_CYCLE_DT::DATE), -13))|| ' to '|| INPUT_FILE_CYCLE_DT FROM dna_investment_dm.INVESTMENT_DATE_STG;
